title: IPC endpoint
extract: IPC:Sockets. Sockets provide point-to-point, two-way communication between two processes. ... A socket is an endpoint of communication to which a name can be bound. It has a type and one or more associated processes. Sockets exist in communication domains.
extract_html: IPC:Sockets. Sockets provide point-to-point, two-way communication between two processes. ... A socket is an endpoint of communication to which a name can be bound. It has a type and one or more associated processes. Sockets exist in communication domains.
